page.title: 04MY FREE TIME BY MICHELLE H.
page.content: AFTER SCHOOL ON WEEK DAYS I USUALLY PLAY WITH MY FRIEND LISA.IF I DON'T GO AND PLAY I USUALLY WATCH TELEVISION OR READ A COMIC.ON THURSDAY I GO TO BALLET LESSONS IN THE METHODIST CHURCH.IN THE EVENINGS I USUALLY WATCH TELEVISION.ON MONDAY AND THURSDAY EVENINGS I GO SWIMMING.I GO TO HARWICH SWIMMING CLUB AND I AM IN THE SQUAD WHICH TRAINS FOR RACES AND GALAS.WE DO FOUR DIFFERENT STROKES AND GO IN FOR GALAS.AT WEEKENDS I USUALLY HELP MY DAD DOING JOBS AROUND THE HOUSE.ON SUNDAYS I GO TO SUNDAY SCHOOL.IT IS GREAT FUN AND WE OFTEN PLAY GAMES THERE.IN THE SUMMER HOLIDAYS WE ALWAYS GO TO HOPE COVE IN DEVON FOR AT LEAST TWO WEEKS.WE ALSO GO TO OUR GRANDMAS WHO LIVE IN STAINES AND WIGAN.
